sentences.en: All other service piping and equipment were essentially intact.
sentences.cn: 其余各供水管及设备基本上安然无恙.

sentences.en: Despite his misfortunes, his faith and optimism remained intact.
sentences.cn: 虽然他遭到一连串的不幸, 他的信心和乐观丝毫未减.

sentences.en: Few buildings survived the bombing raids intact.
sentences.cn: 空袭过后幸存的建物绝无仅有.

sentences.en: He believed the traditional Chinese family was still intact.
sentences.cn: 他相信,中国传统的家庭关系仍然完好无损.

sentences.en: He can scarcely survive this scandal with his reputation intact.
sentences.cn: 他经此丑闻名誉很难不受损.
他的声望丝毫未受影响。

sentences.en: If the family unit is still intact, the patient frequently does very well.
sentences.cn: 如果家庭仍然完整，病人常常恢复得很好。

sentences.en: Most of the house remains intact even after two hundred years.
sentences.cn: 虽然过了两百年，这房子的大部分还保持完好。

sentences.en: Only the medieval tower had remained intact.
sentences.cn: 只有这座中世纪塔楼保存完好。

sentences.en: She refused his offer tactfully , allowing him to go away with his pride intact.
sentences.cn: 她很得体地拒绝了他的提议, 让他能保全面子离开.

sentences.en: Some, including an esterase, may be on the outside of intact lysosomus.
sentences.cn: 包括酯酶的一些, 可以位于完整溶酶体的外表面.
这些易碎的箱子完整无损地运到了。

sentences.en: The glass remained intact after being dropped.
sentences.cn: 那只玻璃杯坠地后依然完好无损.

sentences.en: The money was returned intact by its finder.
sentences.cn: 钱原封未动地被捡拾者送还.

sentences.en: The roof seemed to be intact.
When a bird's nest is overturned, no egg can remain intact.

trans.tran_cn: 完整无缺的，未经触动的，未受损伤的，原封不动的，完好无缺，完好无损
